tab_portalsetting_sticky_menu_note: This setting only applies to the top menu of the site and is disabled for both mobile and tablet views.
tab_portalsetting_favicon_note: Make sure that your image has the following dimensions: 16 x 16 or 32 x 32.
tab_portalsetting_Website_load_icon_enab: Enable or disable the loader overlay from displaying.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_blog_link_en: To disable Page Loader please follow the instructions here.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_blog_link_di: To enable Page Loader please follow the instructions here.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_note: Upload a page loader image, the image will be adjusted to have a height of 100px. The uploaded image will have priority over the selected icon.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_class_note: Choose a predefined load screen icon, which will be used if there is no page loader image.
tab_portalsetting_logo_note: Make sure that your image has the following dimensions of 320 x 80 for optimum quality and retina displays.
tab_portalsetting_top_banner_notes: You can set which banner media will be used by choosing either the image/video tab.
tab_portalsetting_top_banner_video_img_t: This image will only display on the mobile/tablet version of the Home Page.
tab_portalsetting_Theme_Color_note: Choose the colors for different elements of the site.
tab_portalsetting_Force_User_Re_note: Allows user to register with the same email multiple times. Please note that this will create duplicate accounts and randomizes the email. Example: jondoe+123@gmail.com.
tab_portalsetting_Case_Insensitive_Campa: This enables the case insensitivity for the campaign urls. Example, /campaign and /CaMpAiGn will be treated as the same URL otherwise it is different.
tab_portalsetting_Enable_Case_Insensitiv: Enable Case Insensitive Campaign Path Lookup
tab_portalsetting_auto_approve_user_note: Enabling this option will auto approve the user upon registering.
tab_portalsetting_auto_approve_campaign_: Enabling this option will auto approve newly created campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Custom_uri_no: Enables the customization of your campaign URL.</br></br>Note that this toggle cannot be changed if you have Enabled Private Campaigns enabled.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_hide_creator_: This will hide the campaign creator information except the Contact Button in the top right corner on the campaign pages.
tab_portalsetting_Website_Company_note: This is the global website/application name used in various places such as copyright section of footer, campaign display and so on. Please note that changing this name will not affect the url of your website.
tab_portalsetting_payment_setting_enable: This option allows you to disable or enable the payment processing via selected payment gateway.
tab_portalsetting_payment_setting_note: Choose which payment gateway will be used for processing payments on the site.
tab_portalsetting_payment_setting_sca_no: Enable or disable Strong Customer Authentication on all campaigns. SCA is a feature that adds an extra authentication step for the customer.
tab_portalsetting_payment_Setting_stripe: Either your stripe secret key, publishable key or Client ID is not correct, please check these values again and re-enter them if they are not correct as shown on Stripe interface.
tab_portalsetting_Website_Menu_note: Manage your website navigation and footer links. You can also create a custom url link.
tab_portalsetting_terms_policy: Show Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy
tab_portalsetting_terms_policy_note: Choose where you want the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy agreement will be displayed.
tab_portalsetting_post_processing_note: Specify the number of days to give enough time to project creators to determine the status of the campaign and also to allow the backers to re-submit credit card information in case of failure to ensure higher success rate.
tab_portalsetting_Category_display_note: Control the display of your campaigns categories
tab_portalsetting_No_Campaign_message_no: Customize the text for your no campaign message.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Display_note: Enabling this option allows you to show campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_contact_user_notes: Checking this will remove the contact button for all the users in the Campaign page and Profile page.
tab_portalsetting_Decimal_Option_notes: Change decimal notation throughout the whole site.
tab_portalsetting_Allow_Decimal_notes: Checking this will enable decimal notation for contributions
tab_portalsetting_Hide_Decimal: Hide Decimal Notation from all Amounts
tab_portalsetting_Hide_Decimal_notes: Checking this will hide decimal notation for all Amounts throughout the site
tab_portalsetting_Exclude_Shipping_notes: Checking this will exclude the shipping cost from the Funded Amounts.
tab_portalsetting_HomePage_Content_note: You can customize text of the home page or by using html block you will be able to customize that whole section to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_Default_Font: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Middle_Banner_Default_: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Bottom_Banner_Default_: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Explore_PageContent_no: This option controls the search options for campaign search on explore page using search block on the left side.
tab_portalsetting_Explore_homebanner_set: Use Home Page Main Banner Setting
tab_portalsetting_FooterContent_note: Modify the social media header text.
tab_portalsetting_SocialMedia_links_note: Add your social media links and if nothing is specified the social media section will not be displayed.
tab_portalsetting_advanced_widget_note: This setting enables or disables the Advanced CrowdFunding Widget which allows project creators to host campaigns or projects directly on their own website. You can read more about it here.
tab_portalsetting_Mail_SendFrom_note: This email will be used when sending out emails or notifications.
tab_portalsetting_Mail_Admin_note: This email is used when receiving email notifications for the site.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_not: Keep it all - Keep all the funds contributed even if the goal isn't met. All or nothing - Keep the funds contributed if the funded goal is met.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_dir: Direct charges get processed immediately without any delays. This also means that project or campaign creator needs to be handling refunds manually.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_pos: Post charges will process all contributions after campaign has ended. It will first pre-authorize all credit card used for contributions and then allow for those that failed to be re-tried.
tab_portalsetting_admin_change_mode: Only allow admin to change mode after campaign creation
tab_portalsetting_Contribution_behaviour: Choose which modes of pledging are allowed for inline contributions.
tab_portalsetting_WebAnalytics_descripti: This field is for generic website footer code. It will be triggered on every page of the website. This can for example be used for Website Analytics or other Website Widgets and Tools. Simply paste your code snippets here.
tab_portalsetting_WebAnalytics_placehold: Add your website analytics code here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_message: You will need to create Stripe application in the Stripe under 'Your Account -> Account Settings -> Apps'. After this is done you will be able to find your Stripe client_id there. Your secret_key and publishable_key are available under 'Your Account -> Account Settings -> API Keys'. Please copy the three values including client_id, secret_key and publishable_key from Stripe to fields below to finalize your Stripe application setup. For more detailed instructions please click here.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_transact: You can specify the transaction percentage fee for payments when running in marketplace mode (Direct Transactions off).
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_ClientId: Copy your client_id in your account settings under the connect tab.
Please paste your Client ID here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_SecretKe: Copy your Secret Key in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your secret key here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Publishk: Copy your Publishable Key in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your publishable key here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Account_: Select your default country for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_currency: Select your campaign currency for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Redirect: Copy URL below and paste it into your Stripe application under Redirect URIs
This URL will be used to redirect your users back to after they connect with Stripe.
tab_portalsetting_comment_system_toggle_: To hide comment tab from campaign, please go to Portal Settings > Campaign Settings > Tab Options For Campaign Page > Comments. Click the dropdown and select "Always hide comments tab" and make sure to save the Campaign Settings.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_choose_comment_: Choose between Disqus, Facebook or the built-in (Internal) commenting system.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_display_user_pi: This allows the user's photos to be displayed on the comments.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_auto_refresh_de: This will automatically refresh and retrieve new comments every 60 seconds.
tab_portalsetting_comment_anonymous_comm: This option lets you configure whether anonymous comment posts and anonymous comment actions are allowed and which users can use these options
tab_portalsetting_comment_settings_note: Customize the theme of the comment system.
tab_portalsetting_facebook_message2: setup Facebook Developer account and App
tab_portalsetting_facebook_message3: . Once done, copy the App ID and paste it below.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_message3: . Once done, copy the website shortname and paste it below. Shortname is the Disqus URL without .disqus.com suffix.
tab_portalsetting_widget_settings_note: Choose your widget to configure the settings.
tab_portalsetting_Contactform_placeholde: Please enter the contact form receiver email address
tab_portalsetting_Wordpress_Url_note: To enable the wordpress you need to have the API URL.
tab_portalsetting_Display_footer_note: Allow the widget to display on the footer.
tab_portalsetting_Twitter_Code_note: Paste the twitter widget code that is taken from your twitter account settings.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_minimum_butto: This controls the display of the contribute button in your campaign as well as the minimum charge. You can set the minimum or maximum contribution charge to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contribution_: Create Reward Popup On Contribution Button Press
tab_portalsetting_campaign_max_threshold: Hide Max Raise Threshold during campaign creation
tab_portalsetting_campaign_campaign_date: This controls the display of the start date and funding duration on the campaign page.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_display_iso_d: This enables your campaign dates to be formatted differently. Example, If this is enabled your date format will be 2016/05/13 otherwise its May 13 2016.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_enable_past_d: Allow Admin to Set Past Campaign Dates
This option allows website admin to set dates for campaign in the past when editing the project.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_allow_video_t: This option allows for video thumbnail to be uploaded during campaign creation process and played in place of campaign image thumbnail.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_alt_shipping_: This controls alternate shipping Layouts for Japanese and some international markets. The shipping fields will change as well as the input languages. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
Enable Alternate Shipping Layout for Campaigns
tab_portalsetting_campaign_default_shipp: This will be your default shipping country for your campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_shipping_nati: This option is currently only available for Japanese users. DO NOT check this option unless you reside in Japan.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_connect_: Toggle Stripe connection mode between Standard and Express.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_stripe_m: Toggle test mode for development use and testing purposes for transactions. Toggle live mode once you are done with testing and ready to go.
tab_portalsetting_Paypalsetting_paypal_m: Toggle test mode for development use and testing purposes for transactions. Toggle live mode once you are done with testing and ready to go.
tab_portalsetting_Paypalsetting_SecretKe: Copy your Secret Key in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your secret key here
tab_portalsetting_Paypalsetting_Publishk: Copy your Client ID in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your publishable key here
tab_portalsetting_Paypalsetting_Account_: Select your default country for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_Paypalsetting_currency: Select your campaign currency for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_company_phone_placehol: Enter your optional company phone number
tab_portalsetting_campaign_show_progress: The campaign progress details will show the backer info, the total funded amount, total percent funded and the progress bar.
tab_portalsetting_faq_tab_option1: Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or more FAQs
tab_portalsetting_faq_tab_option2: Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option1: Show backers tab if there is at least 1 or more backers
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option2: Always show backers tab even with 0 backers
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option4: Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Creator User
tab_portalsetting_comments_tab_option1: Always show comments tab even with 0 comments
tab_portalsetting_streams_tab_option1: Show stream tab if there is at least 1 or more streams
tab_portalsetting_streams_tab_option2: Always show stream tab even with 0 streams
stripe_token_message: These are optional fields used to pre-fill the form during Stripe connect workflow.
title_too_long: Link title is too long for header menu.
too_many_links: Too many links for header menu.
footer_title_long: Link title is too long for footer menu.
allow_both: Allow Both Registered User and Guest Contributions
tab_portalsetting_stripeerror_msg: Please note that your Stripe credentials have been updated. This may affect your previously created campaigns and cause them not to function anymore. Press OK if you are certain you want to proceed with this action.
tab_portalsetting_direct_transaction_mes: If this option is on, all charges will go to main stripe account on the portal. If this option is turned off, campaigns can connect their own stripe accounts and fees can be taken (marketplace option).
tab_portalsetting_direct_transaction_acc: You enabled direct connect feature, but no Stripe Account has been selected or set, turning toggle off.
Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or m: Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or more FAQs
Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs: Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs
Show backers tab if there is at least 1: Show backers tab if there is at least 1 or more backers
Always show backers tab even with 0 back: Always show backers tab even with 0 backers
Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Cr: Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Creator Users
Show comments tab if there is at least 1: Show comments tab if there is at least 1 or more comments
Always show comments tab even with 0 com: Always show comments tab even with 0 comments
Show stream tab if there is at least 1 o: Show update tab if there is at least 1 or more updates
Always show stream tab even with 0 strea: Always show update tab even with 0 updates
tab_portalsetting_tab_option_campaign_pa: Choose your display options for the campaign tabs. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_show_reward_r: Make Rewards Required during Campaign Creation
tab_portalsetting_campaign_reward_text_n: Controls the display of the reward. You have the choice to show or hide rewards to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_no: Overrides the default transaction percentage fee for each campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_al: Allow project creator to set campaign percentage fee
tab_portalsetting_campaign_keep_campaign: This option keeps the campaign status persistent, meaning whenever users edit the currently active campaign the status won't change automatically back to "Being Reviewed" for example. This can be used in scenarios where you would allow campaign changes by campaign manager without moderator approval for example.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_enable_revisi: This option will enable campaign managers to make revisions to their campaigns while it is approve/running. The user will only be able to make revisions on the Featured Image, Title, Blurb, Top Header Image, Description, FAQ, & Biography of the campaign. After the user has saved the revision the administrator can approve or disapprove the revision.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_campaign_alwa: This option will force capture of funds in post processing mode even if there are failed pledges on campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_group_managem: Allows regular users to manage campaign groups.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_always_anonym: Force all contributions to be anonymous by default
tab_portalsetting_campaign_radio_button_: Change display from dropdown to radio buttons
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contribution_: Change the settings of the Contribution Type on the contribution page
tab_portalsetting_campaign_private_help: This allows users to set campaigns as private, meaning they can only be accessed via special randomly generated URL.</br></br>Note that website administrator and campaign manager can still access campaign in a regular way.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_dedicated_cam: This option enables dedicated file management tab on the campaign interface so that project creators can manage campaign files.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_content_sugge: Optional endpoint which provides content suggestions for certain campaign creation fields. Currently only campaign blurb, description and FAQ field content can be suggested.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_restrict_hint: This option restricts campaign creation and management to website administrator only.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_delayed_campa: Hide campaign steps from campaign creation until campaign is approved.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contribution_: This toggles whether online campaign contributions are enabled or disabled. This is for cases where you only want to process contributions offline via manual transaction interface.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_en: Enable Per Campaign Transaction Percentage Fee
tab_portalsetting_Website_logo_link_mess: The logo link can be an external website URL or internal relative path.
tab_portalsetting_Website_logo_Placehold: Please enter the url where your logo will link to
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rewards_html_: Allows users to use the Text Editor to customize font styles, code, & etc.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contract_numb: Enable Campaign Reference Number during Campaign Creation
tab_portalsetting_custom_fields_for_note: You can additionally add custom fields that are needed for profiles. Advanced Settings require 'Auto Enable New Users'. Using custom fields will enable non-admins to view person attributes.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Cuntinuous_Ru: This option allows you to make changes to the campaign run modes. Please note that continuous campaigns run in direct charge KiA raise mode only.
tab_portalsetting_site_notify_admin_all_: The administrator will receive notifications of any contrbutions sent to campaigns.
Notify Website Administrator for all Campaign Contributions
tab_portalsetting_site_auth_scheme_note: Select which backend authentication scheme will be used. This is for legacy compatibility when importing users into the system and need to use a specific method to authenticate.
tab_portalsetting_user_profile_notes: These options allow you to disable account setting tab under profile settings and control other user options.
tab_portalsetting_site_enable_person_att: Allow Non-Admin To Manage Person Attributes
Allow non-admin users to view and edit person attributes. This setting must be enabled to use custom fields.
tab_portalsetting_site_enable_site_perso: Enable public user search and message composition
This option enables public user search by name and also allows for new message composition.
tab_portalsetting_site_disable_read_to_o: Disallow Read Access To Other Users
If enabled, this option disallows read access to attribute data for all other users, other then administrator and attribute account owner
tab_portalsetting_site_redirect_login_li: These options are for changing the Login and Registration Blocks on the login/register page. You can replace such blocks with link buttons for example. NOTE: By adjusting these settings you may disable regular login.
tab_portalsetting_select_raise_mode_erro: Please select at least one raise mode
tab_portalsetting_campaign_top_header_im: This will remove the Top Header Image on the campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_links_notes: This will remove the Campaign Links on the campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_faq_notes: This will remove the Campaign FAQ on the campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_coupon_manage: Enable or disable customer checkout coupons on rewards.
tab_portalsetting_creator_info_notes: Display options for project creator. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_display_creator_info_n: Display creator name only on campaign header
tab_portalsetting_display_campaign_creat: Display creator profile under campaign description
Display creator profile on campaign header and under campaign description
tab_portalsetting_campaign_backers_hide_: Hide profile link on the backer list
tab_portalsetting_campaign_comments_disp: Display comments in sidebar of campaign, replacing the reward section
tab_portalsetting_campaign_allow_contrib: Allow donors to leave a message with contribution. The message will show on the backers area with the contribution amount.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_switch_card_l: Replace creator name with category name on campaign card
tab_portalsetting_campaign_display_backe: Display backers on the campaign card
tab_portalsetting_campaign_campaign_card: Manage campaign card display options. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_categories_li: Limit Category to 1 during campaign creation
tab_portalsetting_campaign_hide_progress: This option hides the campaign progress information including: Percentage Funded, Goal and the Progress Bar for all campaigns on the website.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_state_note: This option is used to define custom campaign progress status which will show on various campaign views when assigned to campaign. You can define multiple status entries here.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_state_tool_ti: Enter your progress status tooltip text here
tab_portalsetting_campaign_state_file_up: Note: For the best optimal image, please make sure your image has a dimension of 400 width x 32 height
tab_portalsetting_pledge_update_note: This option allows you to restrict pledge contribution replacement to the one where new value has to be greater then the original one. Please note that this feature will only work when campaign is in post processing charge mode.
tab_portalsetting_fixed_duration_note: Set fixed start and end date during campaign creation.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_bank_form_not: This option will add country selection during campaign creation and setup bank data collection form on funding step. Funding account will be based on main portal stripe account.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_faq_note: This option allows you to preset default FAQ name and description and only show FAQ questions/answers on campaign setup interface.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_faq_toggle_la: Enable fixed FAQ name and description
Disable fixed FAQ name and description
tab_portalsetting_campaign_bio_note: If this option is enabled, then it will replace the user profile description with campaign biography
tab_portalsetting_campaign_profile_note: This option removes the profile step from the campaign edit UI.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_defaults_note: This option allows you to set defaults for various campaign options used during creation process.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_defaults_erro: The Campaign Defaults setting requires valid dates
tab_portalsetting_campaign_raise_mode_er: You need at least one raise mode enabled before you can proceed.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_default_shipp: You need to select a default shipping country when 'Alternate Shipping Layout for Campaigns' is selected.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_defaults_deta: Remove fundraising section and use defaults
tab_portalsetting_campaign_blurb_notes: This is where you can manage the controls of the campaign blurb
tab_portalsetting_campaign_blurb_display: Display campaign blurb on the sidebar
tab_portalsetting_campaign_button_text_n: This option allows you the write in custom text for the 'Contribute' and 'Choose Reward' buttons during creation process.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_button_text_c: Enter text formatting for contribution button. Use special token "[min]" for minimum contribution amount assigned to campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_button_text_r: Enter text formatting for reward button. Use special token "[reward]" for amount assigned to reward.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rewards_attri: This will set the attribute to be required.
Set the campaign reward attribute to be required
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rewards_phone: This will set the phone number to be required.
Set the campaign reward phone number to be required
tab_portalsetting_campaign_withdraw_labe: Hide the withdraw contribution button from My Contributions.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contribution_: Switch between normal and alternate layout for campaign contribution UI. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_alt_city_inpu: This toggle enables alternate text based city input, instead of the auto-complete one. It also changes order of certain address fields such as city, country and subcountry. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_express_note: This option allows contributors to use express guest checkout feature.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_ea_header: Specify Google Analytics Tracking ID or Tracking Code. The tracking ID is a string like UA-000000-2 for example. Do not paste the snippet of code here.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_fb_header: Specify Facebook Pixel ID. The ID is a large number like 349857983475 for example. Do not paste the snippet of code here.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rc_id_header: Your plugin app ID can be found in your ReviewCandy profile settings.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rc_secret_hea: Your plugin secret key can be found in your ReviewCandy profile settings.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_missing_refer: Whoops! Looks like you forgot your ReferralCandy plugin ID and Secret Key.
tab_portalsetting_site_auto_expand_subca: Auto Select All Subcategories When Expanding Parent Category
tab_portalsetting_campaign_goog_note: This option allows you to automatically shorten your campaign URL when sharing it to other websites via sharing options
tab_portalsetting_campaign_goog_placehol: Google API Key from API Console
tab_portalsetting_site_featured_campaign: This option will increase the limit of featured campaigns displayed on the home page to 100.
tab_portalsetting_site_infinite_scroller: This option allows you to add infinite scroller button to selected areas of the website.
tab_portalsetting_site_rows_campaign_not: This option allows you to set the number of rows to display on selected areas of the website.
tab_portalsetting_set_explore_default_so: This is where you can set the default sort dropdown option for the explore page.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_explainer_tex: Generic help text for campaign that only administrators can manage per campaign. This text can be updated from campaign creation process.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_notes: Display option for campaign page. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_pledge_i: Display simple verbal campaign pledge info
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_line_up_: Line up bottom sidebar section with campaign about section
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_about_sh: Display share button under campaign about section
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_simplify: Display contribution amount below name on sidebar backer list
tab_portalsetting_campaign_page_share_he: Show share header upon campaign creation
tab_portalsetting_site_campaign_manageme: These options allow you to control the settings under Campaign Management interface.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_toggle_hide_d: Set 'Hide Days To Go' on by default
tab_portalsetting_campaign_toggle_checkb: You can use these settings to control default state of certain campaign creation options.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_tipping_note: Enable website tipping, where contributors can choose to send a tip to website.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_bottom_tip: Move Tipping to Bottom of Summary
tab_portalsetting_campaign_verification_: Enable Trulioo verification for campaigns. Please note that this feature only works on Scale or Enterprise plan. You also need to contact us to request for this feature to be fully enabled on the backend.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_note: Enable Social Login for inline contribution and user login. Please note that this feature only works on Scale or Enterprise plan. You also need to contact us to request for this feature to be fully enabled on the backend.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_missing_socia: Please fill in Otka domain & ClientId to enable this feature
tab_portalsetting_social_login_okta_note: You need to register an account on Okta to enable social login feature. For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_facebook_: For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_linkedin_: For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_microsoft: For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_apple_not: For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_google_no: You need to register a Google Developer account to get Client ID and Secret. For more detail, please visit Thrinacia Blog for instruction.
tab_portalsetting_social_login_enable_if: Enable support for Okta social login when Sedra widget is embedded into an iframe, this requires some additional steps outlined in this Thrinacia Blog post.
tab_portalsetting_site_mobile_view_adjus: Using these options you can adjust your mobile view elements accordingly. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_site_mobile_view_move_: Move the embed button below the comments accordion
Move the backers accordion below the creator accordion
tab_portalsetting_theme_setting_custom_f: This is where you can add your custom html block for the site's footer. This block will display on all the pages above the main footer fold.
tab_portalsetting_theme_setting_custom_h: This is where you can add your custom html block for the site's homepage. This block will display between the main top banner and campaign section.
tab_portalsetting_display_campaign_creat: Display creator profile on the sidebar
Display creator profile left of header
tab_portalsetting_campaign_share_campaig: Control the display of the share buttons on the campaign page. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_share_display: Display only Facebook, Twitter & Email share buttons on the sidebar
tab_portalsetting_campaign_organization_: Enables Organization Name and EIN, replacing Name where applicable
tab_portalsetting_campaign_restrict_stri: This option restricts stripe account changes on the post processing campaigns only where there are 1 or more contributions to prevent problems with stripe processing workflow
tab_portalsetting_campaign_accept_profil: Contribution Individual Profile and Organization Attributes

This option allows contributor to select either Individual Profile or Business Organization and shows Address and Phone Number sections in addition to main ones that user can fill out so that information can be exported at later time.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_pledge_redire: Specify global URL that will be used to redirect contributor after successful pledge.
tab_portalsetting_cookie_consent_notes: This option alerts users about the use of cookies on your website.
tab_portalsetting_unsupported_browsers_t: Enable FB App and FB Messenger App Detection
tab_portalsetting_unsupported_browsers_n: This option shows message when Facebook App or Facebook Messenger App is detected, allowing users to copy and paste link to visit the target website.
tab_portalsetting_unsupported_browsers_l: Enable FB App and FB Messenger App Detection
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_disp: Control the display of the Campaign Creation fields for each of the steps. WARNING Before enabling these toggles please read this article.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_step: Configure the global display of the campaign steps
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_fiel: Stack the display of the labels, fields & notes
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_hide: Hide start campaign page and redirect to campaign creation step 1 when creating a campaign
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_disp: Display previous button on the campaign creation header instead of the footer
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_star: Select current date by default for campaign start date
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_spli: Split user profile name & address fields into separate steps
tab_portalsetting_campaign_creation_laun: Move launch campaign action to this step (If this is enabled it will hide the campaign preview step)
tab_portalsetting_payment_Setting_transa: Transaction Fee must be between 0 and 100
tab_portalsetting_payment_Setting_public: Please double check the format of your public key
tab_portalsetting_payment_Setting_secret: Please double check the format of your secret key
tab_portalsetting_payment_Setting_client: Please double check the format of your client key
tab_portalsetting_campaign_disclaimer_no: If this option is turned on it shows campaign disclaimer/notice. Please note that you can either use raw HTML code or plain text.
tab_portalsetting_hide_transaction_detai: Hide Sensitive Transaction Data from Campaign Manager Transaction Interface.
